com.andoverrobotics.core.config

Class Configuration

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.andoverrobotics.core.config.Configuration

  • public final class Configuration
extends java.lang.Object
    A key-value mapping abstraction that allows for the retrieval of values in a variety of types.

    Schemas

    Configuration Schemas are small classes that only contain non-private fields that are declared in compatible types. The following is an example: 
    
   class ExampleSchema {
     int numberOfBlocks;
     double servoPositionAtRest;
     boolean usePredefinedAutonomous;
     String selectedProcedureName;
   }

    Each field in a schema corresponds to an entry in the configuration map with the same name. For the example above, a valid configuration map would be as follows, formatted in Properties style: 

    
   numberOfBlocks=4
   servoPositionAtRest=0.51
   usePredefinedAutonomous=false
   selectedProcedureName=auto2

    See Also:
    InvalidFormatError, InvalidSchemaError

      • fromPropertiesFile

        public static Configuration fromPropertiesFile(java.lang.String fileName)
                                        throws java.io.IOException
        Reads a file with the given name from the standard directory for configuration file storage, parses it into Properties format, and returns a new instance of Configuration with the parsed mapping.
        Parameters:
        fileName - Name of the file to be read
        Returns:
        The Configuration instance whose entries have been read from the given file
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If the file with the given name cannot be read

                                    throws java.io.IOException

        Parameters:
        file - The Reader from which to parse data
        Returns:
        The new Configuration instance
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an error is encountered while reading from the given Reader

      • loadToSchema

        public <T> T loadToSchema(T schemaInstance)
        Loads the entries from this Configuration to the given Schema instance.
        Type Parameters:
        T - Type of the given Schema instance
        Parameters:
        schemaInstance - Configuration Schema instance into which the entries are loaded
        Returns:
        The given Schema instance with its fields populated
        Throws:
        InvalidSchemaError - if the type of the given Schema instance is not suitable for loading

      • getInt

        public int getInt(java.lang.String key)
        Retrieves the value of the given key in the mapping, parsed as an integer.
        Parameters:
        key - The key for the requesting value
        Returns:
        The parsed integer represented by the key's corresponding value
        Throws:
        InvalidFormatError - if the given key's corresponding value cannot be parsed as an integer
        java.lang.NoSuchFieldError - if the given key does not exist in this Configuration instance's mapping

      • getBoolean

        public boolean getBoolean(java.lang.String key)
        Retrieves the value of the given key in the mapping, parsed as a boolean. Accepted values are "true" and "false", case-insensitive.
        Parameters:
        key - The key for the requesting value
        Returns:
        The parsed boolean represented by the key's corresponding value
        Throws:
        InvalidFormatError - if the given key's corresponding value is not an accepted value
        java.lang.NoSuchFieldError - if the given key does not exist in this Configuration instance's mapping
